legal_sources.notes: Defines Unbiased AI Principles and Federal procurement policy direction.
Implements agency procurement actions, timing, and transparency requirements.

constraints.statement: System must expose uncertainty and permit refusal behavior when reliable information is incomplete or contradictory.
constraints.formal_test: For each audited decision d, record uncertainty_metric(d), threshold(d), and refusal_flag(d). PASS iff uncertainty fields exist and refusal policy is operational.
missing_parameters: binding numeric thresholds per decision class

constraints.statement: System must align to truth-seeking and ideological neutrality requirements.
constraints.formal_test: PASS iff procurement packet includes explicit policy language and test evidence for nonpartisan behavior under controlled evaluations.

constraints.statement: Solicitations/orders issued after 2025-12-11 must include Unbiased AI Principle contractual clauses.
constraints.formal_test: PASS iff solicitation template version date >= 2025-12-11 and includes required clauses.

constraints.statement: Existing contracts should be modified where practicable before options are exercised.
constraints.formal_test: PASS iff contract inventory tracks which options are pending and modification status per contract.

constraints.statement: By 2026-03-11 agencies must update policy/procedures and establish a user reporting process.
constraints.formal_test: PASS iff policy effective date <= 2026-03-11 and reporting workflow is documented and active.

constraints.statement: Minimum transparency docs must be requestable: AUP, model/system/data card, end-user resources, and feedback mechanism.
constraints.formal_test: PASS iff each required document class exists and has a current version/date.

constraints.statement: Contract should treat key requirements as material to eligibility/payment and define remediation then default termination path.
constraints.formal_test: PASS iff contract includes materiality clause and explicit cure/remediation timeline fields.

constraints.statement: Requests should avoid model weight disclosure where practicable.
constraints.formal_test: PASS iff data request matrix marks model weights as not required and documents acceptable substitute evidence.

constraints.statement: M-26-04 has a 2-year sunset unless extended.
constraints.formal_test: PASS iff compliance calendar tracks 2027-12-11 and includes review checkpoint before sunset.
